column1: I will try to describe as good as possible my experience. (First Review)
First my thoughts on the Box before assembling.
The Box represents the 3 Dinosaurs from the Masterpiece Gallery which are very impressive when you stand in front of them.
column2: No photo can describe or show the real beauty of almost 3 Meter tall Monsters.

column1: The construction experience is not as much repetitive as i imagined to build 3 times a Dinosaur. The Skeletons, the basis are pretty much the same but built every time with different pieces so the construction is pretty exciting.
